function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specific measures for contagious disease propagation in residential buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks within residential buildings","Mitigation":"Implementing specific measures such as ventilation systems, sanitization protocols, and spatial design to reduce the spread of contagious diseases","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, UV-C sanitization devices, smart building technologies for monitoring and control","People":"Residents, building occupants, and visitors","Owner":"Architects, building developers, facility managers"},{"Description":"Complex issue requiring a thorough and integral approach","Impact":"Inadequate or partial solutions leading to continued vulnerability to contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive and adaptable strategies, integrating input from various stakeholders, and continuous monitoring and adaptation","Technologies":"Data analytics for monitoring, adaptive building technologies, collaborative communication platforms","People":"Architects, decision-makers, planners, investors, and end-users","Owner":"Stakeholder committees, public health authorities, and building management teams"},{"Description":"Affirmative attitude towards residential space leading to complacency","Impact":"Overlooking the importance of ongoing vigilance and proactive measures to address contagious disease risks","Mitigation":"Providing ongoing education and awareness, promoting community engagement, and integrating public health guidelines into residential design and management","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, virtual reality for educational simulations, IoT devices for health monitoring","People":"Community members, architects, building managers","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, and architects"}]}
